name: Endra 5
description:
You thought I was done?

Hell no!  I'm using the brand spanking new

Rpg developer BAKIN! 

This game is about magical vegetable based crystals and a evil mage who is after them, or is it someone OTHER than a evil mage that is after the crystals...?

For the moment You can explore the town of Salbornia and the forest of Tenebro and defeat the evil boss goblin.

The full game will have more zaniness, more comedy, and more secrets!
